name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Dedicated Senior .NET Engineer with over 10 years of experience in financial software development, leveraging .NET technologies to deliver high-performance and secure applications. Proficient in cloud computing, with extensive experience in **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Azure DevOps**, coupled with a strong foundation in **CI/CD** methodologies and **Terraform** for infrastructure as code. Adept in designing and implementing **REST APIs** and automated testing processes, ensuring high-quality software delivery. Demonstrated ability to solve complex problems through algorithmic thinking and effective collaboration, leading teams to build robust systems. Additionally, skilled in modern tech stacks including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on expertise in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Passionate about driving real-world impact through scalable and maintainable software solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Developed and maintained robust **.NET** applications and services, integrating **REST APIs** to enhance the functionality and performance of healthcare and financial software solutions.
•	Designed and executed scalable **CI/CD** pipelines using **Azure DevOps**, ensuring timely delivery and consistent quality in product updates, achieving a sprint completion rate of up to **95%**.
•	Implemented infrastructure as code with **Terraform**, automating deployment and configuration management across AWS cloud services, leading to a **40%** reduction in deployment-related incidents.
•	Enhanced software quality through automated testing frameworks, collaborating on **Automated Testing** setups to ensure comprehensive coverage, resulting in a **30%** decrease in defects in production releases.
•	Optimized system performance by resolving complex challenges through advanced **Problem Solving** techniques and **Algorithmic Thinking**, directly contributing to improved application response times by **25%**.
•	Collaborated cross-functionally to integrate financial data processing features within applications, leveraging financial software development principles to meet specific compliance standards, such as GDPR and PCI DSS.
•	Provided mentorship to junior developers in adopting best practices for **.NET** development and Azure cloud solutions, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and knowledge sharing within the team.
•	Participated in the architectural design and code reviews, ensuring that implementations met established standards and were scalable, maintainable, and aligned with project timelines.
•	Contributed to the identification and implementation of performance improvements across existing systems, facilitating smoother operational workflows and enhancing user satisfaction metrics by over **20%**.

Develop and maintain scalable financial software applications using **.NET** technologies, leveraging **AWS** cloud infrastructure to enhance performance and reliability.
Implement CI/CD pipelines to facilitate automated testing and continuous deployment, ensuring high code quality and quick delivery cycles for financial products.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and develop REST APIs for seamless integration of various platforms, enhancing overall system interoperability.
Utilize **Terraform** and **Azure DevOps** to automate infrastructure provisioning and management, leading to a **25%** increase in deployment efficiency.
Engage in problem-solving and algorithmic thinking to troubleshoot complex issues, leading to a **30%** reduction in system downtime through proactive maintenance.
Lead comprehensive testing strategies, including automated testing frameworks, to ensure the robustness of financial applications that handle over **1 million** transactions daily.
Participate in architecting solutions that prioritize security and compliance, crucial for the financial industry, ensuring systems meet required standards for data protection.
Conduct code reviews and mentor junior developers, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and knowledge sharing within the development team.

- Developed and maintained **REST APIs** for a financial software solution using **.NET**, ensuring adherence to industry standards for performance and security while enabling efficient data interchange.
- Leveraged **AWS** cloud services for scalability and reliability, optimizing deployment processes through **Terraform** and **Azure DevOps**, contributing to a reduction in deployment time by **30%**.
- Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines, resulting in increased deployment frequency and stability, with an uptick in automated testing coverage by **40%** to ensure software quality and reduce bugs.
- Employed **Automated Testing** strategies to achieve robust software solutions, enhancing functionality testing and issue detection efficiency, implementing test cases that covered **90%** of critical features.
- Utilized problem-solving and algorithmic thinking to design scalable solutions that improved system performance by **25%**, addressing complexities in financial data processing.
- Collaborated cross-functionally to address technical challenges and improve end-user experience, integrating feedback loops that led to a **15%** increase in software usability ratings.
- Developed innovative features with a focus on performance and user experience while maintaining compliance with financial regulations, facilitating user access and enhancing security protocols including **OAuth 2.0**.
- Conducted code reviews and mentoring sessions, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and adhering to best practices within the engineering team.
